Title: Star Trap and Star Throw
Details:
Prints, Star Trap is 3/15 and has an issue with the framing.  At some point the painting came loose from the mat.  Weirdly, it looks like there is another print behind it.  The frame probably needs to opened up to fix this.

Star Throw is 2/15.

Title: Wilton Forest
Details: Was at Sun Valley.  This was owned by Kevin but he transferred it to Bill in April ’21.  Bill replaced the frame.
